item.description:
Customer management endpoints for tracking salon clients.

Access Control:
- GET /api/customers - OWNER and RECEPTIONIST ✅
- GET /api/customers/:id - OWNER and RECEPTIONIST ✅
- POST /api/customers - OWNER and RECEPTIONIST ✅
- PUT /api/customers/:id - OWNER and RECEPTIONIST ✅
- DELETE /api/customers/:id - OWNER only ✅
- GET /api/customers/search - OWNER and RECEPTIONIST ✅

Customer Fields:
- name (required): Customer's full name
- phoneNumber (required): Primary contact number
- email (optional): Email address
- address (optional): Physical address
- notes (optional): Additional notes about the customer
- totalAppointments (auto): Total number of appointments
- totalSpent (auto): Total amount spent
- lastVisit (auto): Date of last appointment

item.name: Appointments

request.description:
Get all appointments with pagination. Sorted by date (newest first). Requires OWNER or RECEPTIONIST role.

Query Parameters:
- page: Page number (default: 1)
- limit: Number of appointments per page (default: 10)

Get today's appointments with pagination (excludes CANCELLED). Requires OWNER or RECEPTIONIST role.

Query Parameters:
- page: Page number (default: 1)
- limit: Number of appointments per page (default: 10)
Get a single appointment by ID. Requires OWNER or RECEPTIONIST role.

Create a new appointment. Requires OWNER or RECEPTIONIST role.

Required fields:
- customerId (MongoDB ObjectId)
- staffId (MongoDB ObjectId)
- serviceIds (Array of MongoDB ObjectIds - at least one service required)
- appointmentDate (ISO8601 date string)

Optional fields:
- status (SCHEDULED, CONFIRMED, IN_PROGRESS, COMPLETED, CANCELLED, NO_SHOW - default: SCHEDULED)
- notes

Note: Duration and price are automatically calculated as the sum of all selected services.

Update an appointment. Requires OWNER or RECEPTIONIST role. All fields are optional.

If services are changed, duration and price are automatically recalculated as the sum of all selected services.
Cancel an appointment (soft delete - sets status to CANCELLED). Requires OWNER or RECEPTIONIST role.

item.description:
Appointment management endpoints.

Access Control:
- GET /api/appointments - OWNER and RECEPTIONIST ✅
- GET /api/appointments/today - OWNER and RECEPTIONIST ✅
- GET /api/appointments/:id - OWNER and RECEPTIONIST ✅
- POST /api/appointments - OWNER and RECEPTIONIST ✅
- PUT /api/appointments/:id - OWNER and RECEPTIONIST ✅
- DELETE /api/appointments/:id - OWNER and RECEPTIONIST ✅

Appointment Statuses:
- SCHEDULED: Appointment is scheduled but not confirmed
- CONFIRMED: Appointment is confirmed by customer
- IN_PROGRESS: Service is currently being provided
- COMPLETED: Service has been completed
- CANCELLED: Appointment was cancelled
- NO_SHOW: Customer did not show up

Appointment Fields:
- customer (required): Reference to Customer
- staff (required): Reference to Staff Member
- services (required): Array of references to Services (at least one required)
- appointmentDate (required): Date and time of appointment
- duration (auto): Sum of all service durations
- price (auto): Sum of all service prices
- status (optional): Default is SCHEDULED
- notes (optional): Additional notes
- createdBy (auto): User who created the appointment

Multiple Services:
Appointments support multiple services per booking. For example, a customer can book a haircut and coloring in one appointment. The total duration and price are automatically calculated.

item.name: Revenue

request.description:
Get overall revenue metrics including total revenue, total appointments, average transaction, and total customers. Requires OWNER role.

Query Parameters (all optional):
- year: Filter by specific year (e.g., 2025)
- startDate & endDate: Filter by custom date range (ISO8601 format)

Default: Current year if no filters provided

Get revenue breakdown by staff member. Returns total revenue, appointment count, and average revenue per staff member. Sorted by total revenue (highest first). Requires OWNER role.

Query Parameters (all optional):
- year: Filter by specific year (e.g., 2025)
- startDate & endDate: Filter by custom date range (ISO8601 format)

Default: Current year if no filters provided

Get revenue breakdown by service category. Returns total revenue and service count per category. Sorted by total revenue (highest first). Requires OWNER role.

Query Parameters (all optional):
- year: Filter by specific year (e.g., 2025)
- startDate & endDate: Filter by custom date range (ISO8601 format)

Default: Current year if no filters provided

Get monthly revenue trends for the specified year. Returns revenue and appointment count for each month. Months with no appointments will show 0 revenue. Requires OWNER role.

Query Parameters:
- year: Filter by specific year (e.g., 2025) - optional, defaults to current year

Get detailed monthly revenue data including total revenue, appointments, and breakdown by staff and category. Requires OWNER role.

Query Parameters:
- filter: 'current' for current month, 'last' for last month (optional)
- month: Specific month (1-12) - optional
- year: Specific year - optional

Default: Current month if no parameters provided

Response includes:
- Total revenue for the month
- Total appointments
- Average transaction value
- Revenue breakdown by staff member
- Revenue breakdown by service category

Get revenue metrics for a specific staff member. Returns total revenue, appointment count, and average revenue. Requires OWNER role.

Query Parameters (all optional):
- year: Filter by specific year (e.g., 2025)
- startDate & endDate: Filter by custom date range (ISO8601 format)

Default: Current year if no filters provided

item.description:
Revenue reporting and analytics endpoints. All revenue endpoints require OWNER role and only count COMPLETED appointments.

Access Control:
- GET /api/revenue/metrics - OWNER only ✅
- GET /api/revenue/by-staff - OWNER only ✅
- GET /api/revenue/by-category - OWNER only ✅
- GET /api/revenue/trends - OWNER only ✅
- GET /api/revenue/staff/:staffId - OWNER only ✅

Revenue Calculation:
- Only COMPLETED appointments are counted in revenue
- Revenue is based on the appointment price (sum of all services)
- All endpoints support filtering by year or custom date range

Common Query Parameters:
- year: Integer (2000-2100) - Filter by specific year
- startDate: ISO8601 date - Start of custom date range
- endDate: ISO8601 date - End of custom date range

If no date filter is provided, endpoints default to the current year.
